INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(../../include/flowvr-vrpn/core/ ${FLOWVR_INCLUDE_DIR} ${VRPN_INCLUDES} ${QUAT_INCLUDES})      

ADD_EXECUTABLE(vrpn2flowvr vrpn2flowvr.cpp)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(vrpn2flowvr ${FLOWVR_base_LIBRARY} ${FLOWVR_ftl_LIBRARY} ${FLOWVR_mod_LIBRARY} ${VRPN_LIBRARY} ${QUAT_LIBRARY})

INSTALL(TARGETS vrpn2flowvr  DESTINATION ${MODULE_DIR})
